attributes.action: UK congress senate and House of Representations
attributes.additional_details: The UK Government should abolish the UK parliament and create a UK Congress which would have a Senate and House of Representations. The UK government should then abolish the devolved Parliament and Assemblies of Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland and London and devolve regional Congresses with the same law making powers as the UK congress to all four countries of the UK. which will Make the UK am equal and federal country.
